name: work
description: This staff member can do generic work like hauling, cleaning, and operating machinery, with other similar things

name: crafting
description: This staff member can do crafting and construction of objects, buildings and machiner.

name: research
description: This staff member can do research and scientific work.

name: combat
description: This staff member can combat and defened.

name: lab-work
description: This staff member can do crafting requiring complex laboratory & tools like synthesis of medicines or of other organic & inorganic composts.

name: demonic
description: This staff member can do work that heavily requires or for which is exposed to demonic or hell resources.
